source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.7 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 792,105.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.7 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 792,105.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.7 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 792,105.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Legwraps of the Greatest Son

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.7 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 792,105.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 927,918 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Chime of Melodic Reflection
